Total Required Credits for the Program: 15 s.h. To be awarded the Certificate in Teaching in Urban & Diverse Settings, students must complete all courses required for the CUGS in Teaching in Urban & Diverse Settings with at least a 3.0 average. This CUGS is best suited for students majoring in Inclusive Education, Early Childhood, Elementary Education, and/or Subject Matter Education.
